MSR.Q: Which three sectors have a sum of percentage less than 40%? List all possible combinations.
MSR.A: The possible combinations are: {(Beach Resorts, Adventure Travel, International Tourism), (Beach Resorts, Eco-Tourism, International Tourism), (Domestic Tourism, Cruise Travel, Eco-Tourism), (Domestic Tourism, Cruise Travel, International Tourism), (Domestic Tourism, Adventure Travel, Eco-Tourism), (Domestic Tourism, Adventure Travel, International Tourism), (Domestic Tourism, Eco-Tourism, International Tourism), (Cruise Travel, Adventure Travel, Eco-Tourism), (Cruise Travel, Adventure Travel, International Tourism), (Cruise Travel, Eco-Tourism, International Tourism), (Adventure Travel, Eco-Tourism, International Tourism)}.
